name: Chronicles of Burnet Demo
description:
This Demo consist of the first stage of the game how the game will look and how the battle system will work

makostacks Games Presents: Chronicles of Burnet 

Made By Robert Young

Written by: Janie Balderas

Long ago a couple named Kai and Azucena started a revolution and won they called their new country Rancier and the country grew and grew but things changed when a man named Kenneth came along he helped his friend Janie start a new country called Burnet but when this new country seeks independence from Rancier a war breaks out playthrough this epic open world RPG adventure and fight for not just yourself not just Janie not just your friends and family but for Burnet's independence from Ranicer 

How to save and keep the save file on Mobile:

To save on Mobile devices download a 3rd party browser Chrome, Opera, Brave etc on your phone and play the game that way 

for some reason the default browser provided on your phone Safari/Google only save the game for a limited time but through Chrome the save is there in definite Note this has been tested on Private browsers Brave/Opera and works the same way 

Credits: Developed by: makostacks Games owned by makostacks Productions in partnership with Janie Balderas

Controls:

PC:

Movement: Arrow keys, Num pad

Action: Z, Enter, Space or walk up to it

Cancel: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Menu: X, Esc, Num pad 0

Dash: Shift

Previous Page: Q, Page Up

Next Page: W, Page Down

Scroll Pages: Arrow Keys, Num pad

Xbox Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: A

Cancel: B

Menu: Y

Dash: X

Previous Page: LB

Next Page: RB

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Playstation Controller:

Movement: D-Pad

Action: X button

Cancel: Circle

Menu: Triangle

Dash: Square

Previous Page: L1

Next Page: R1

Scroll Pages: D-Pad

Mobile Controls:

Movement: Tap destination *2

Action: Tap target

Cancel: Tap with two fingers

Menu: Tap with two fingers

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Tap and hold as you swipe from inside of page to outside of page.

Mouse:

Movement: Click destination *2

Action: Click Target

Cancel: Right Click

Menu: Right Click

Dash: None

Previous Page: None

Next Page: None

Scroll Pages: Drag from inside of page to outside of page/mouse scroll wheel
